title: How hard is it to have a long distance relationship? - Quora

response.answer_text: A massive bond of trust must be built between both partners, and cheating can occur at any time, you don’t know what he/she is doing all you can trust is what she/he is telling you.A long distance relationship if it surpasses 1year one meets the other one, is completely a child play, if their is a logical reason then it’s something else.I used to trust LDRS, but after I experienced they take so much efforts. and it sucks if your partner isn’t doing the same thing for the relationship.
